description: Try our easy to follow Thai Chicken With Pineapple & Cucumber Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Quick & easy dinner,Rice,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken
name: Thai Chicken With Pineapple & Cucumber Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 chicken breast fillets with thai coriander & chilli

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together lime juice, honey and 1 tbs oil in a medium bowl. Add cucumber, pineapple, spring onion and chilli. Season with salt and pepper and stir to combine.

Heat a large frying pan or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Drizzle chicken with remaining oil and cook for 3-4 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through. Top with pineapple salsa, lime zest and coriander. Serve with rice.
